name: @laserfiche/lf-repository-api-client
description: Laserfiche Repository API Client library for TypeScript.

scripts.test:all: node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --rootDir=test --config jest.node.config.js && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --rootDir=test --config jest.jsdom.config.js
scripts.build: nswag run && npm run clean && tsc -b

author: Laserfiche
